DresdenStory is an app to get to know or rediscover the most exciting places in Dresden, through a fun and different experience.

Map: See the location where each chapter takes place. Get directions to reach each point.

Story: Find historical references told through storytelling, images and challenges.

This project was created by Ana Pinilla and Valerian Lange as part of the Cartography M.Sc. programme.

DresdenStory is a story-based city guide to get to know or rediscover the most exciting places in Dresden.
